# Load Packages

```{r}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(message=F)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(tidymodels)
library(tsibble)
library(ingredients)
```

# Load Data

```{r}
# n = 6 (original data)
data_n6 <- readRDS(here("data/processed_data/wbe_covid_n6_week.rds")) %>% drop_na()

# n = 5
data_n5 <- readRDS(here("data/processed_data/wbe_covid_n5_week.rds")) %>% drop_na()

# n = 4
data_n4 <- readRDS(here("data/processed_data/wbe_covid_n4_week.rds")) %>% drop_na()

# n = 3
data_n3 <- readRDS(here("data/processed_data/wbe_covid_n3_week.rds")) %>% drop_na()

# n = 2
data_n2 <- readRDS(here("data/processed_data/wbe_covid_n2_week.rds")) %>% drop_na()

# n = 1
data_n1 <- readRDS(here("data/processed_data/wbe_covid_n1_week.rds")) %>% drop_na()
```

# Split data

```{r}
data_n6_train <- data_n6 %>% head(n = 75)
data_n6_test <- data_n6 %>% tail(n = 50)

data_n5_train <- data_n5 %>% head(n = 75)
data_n5_test <- data_n5 %>% tail(n = 50)

data_n4_train <- data_n4 %>% head(n = 75)
data_n4_test <- data_n4 %>% tail(n = 50)

data_n3_train <- data_n3 %>% head(n = 75)
data_n3_test <- data_n3 %>% tail(n = 50)

data_n2_train <- data_n2 %>% head(n = 75)
data_n2_test <- data_n2 %>% tail(n = 50)

data_n1_train <- data_n1 %>% head(n = 75)
data_n1_test <- data_n1 %>% tail(n = 50)
```

# Model tuning

## Define model

```{r}
#define model
rf_model <- rand_forest(
  mtry = tune(), 
  trees = 1000, 
  min_n = tune()) %>% 
  set_engine("ranger", importance = "permutation") %>% 
  set_mode("regression") 
```

## Create workflow

```{r}
#workflow for assay pos models
df_workflow <- workflow() %>%
  add_model(rf_model) %>% 
  add_formula(log10_cases ~ 
              A_N1_POS+A_N2_POS+B_N1_POS+B_N2_POS+C_N1_POS+C_N2_POS)
```

## Set up cross-validation

```{r}
set.seed(13)
folds_n6 <- vfold_cv(data_n6_train)
```

## Define tuning grid

```{r}
doParallel::registerDoParallel()

set.seed(345)
tune_rf_1 <- tune_grid(
  df_workflow,
  resamples = folds_n6,
  grid = 20)
```

```{r}
#check RMSE
tune_rf_1 %>%
  collect_metrics() %>%
  filter(.metric == "rmse") %>%
  select(mean, min_n, mtry) %>%
  pivot_longer(min_n:mtry,
    values_to = "value",
    names_to = "parameter"
  ) %>%
  ggplot(aes(value, mean, color = parameter)) +
  geom_point(show.legend = FALSE) +
  facet_wrap(~parameter, scales = "free_x") +
  labs(x = NULL, y = "RMSE")
```

```{r}
#check RSQ
tune_rf_1 %>%
  collect_metrics() %>%
  filter(.metric == "rsq") %>%
  select(mean, min_n, mtry) %>%
  pivot_longer(min_n:mtry,
    values_to = "value",
    names_to = "parameter"
  ) %>%
  ggplot(aes(value, mean, color = parameter)) +
  geom_point(show.legend = FALSE) +
  facet_wrap(~parameter, scales = "free_x") +
  labs(x = NULL, y = "R-Squared")
```

## Select the best model

```{r}
#select the best model based on R-square value
best_rsq_1 <- tune_rf_1 %>%
  select_best(metric = "rsq")

final_rf_1 <- finalize_model(rf_model, best_rsq_1)

final_rf_1
```

# Model fitting & CV

## Create final workflow

```{r}
final_wf_1 <- workflow() %>% 
  add_model(final_rf_1) %>% 
  add_formula(log10_cases ~ 
              A_N1_POS+A_N2_POS+B_N1_POS+B_N2_POS+C_N1_POS+C_N2_POS)
```

## n = 6

```{r}
#fit model to data
set.seed(13)
fit_df_n6 <- final_wf_1 %>% 
  fit(data_n6_train)

#create folds for cross validation
set.seed(13)
folds_df_n6 <- vfold_cv(data_n6_train, 
                        v = 10, repeats = 10, strata = log10_cases)

#run cross validation
set.seed(13)
cv_df_n6 <- fit_resamples(final_wf_1, resamples = folds_df_n6)
cv_df_n6_metrics <- collect_metrics(cv_df_n6,summarize = F)
df_n6_metrics_sum <- collect_metrics(cv_df_n6,summarize = T)

#check cross validation metrics
df_n6_metrics_sum 
```

## Export results

```{r}
cv_df_n6_metrics <- cv_df_n6_metrics %>% mutate(.config="df_n6",
                                                feature="df")
cv_df_n5_metrics <- cv_df_n5_metrics %>% mutate(.config="df_n5",
                                                feature="df")
cv_df_n4_metrics <- cv_df_n4_metrics %>% mutate(.config="df_n4",
                                                feature="df")
cv_df_n3_metrics <- cv_df_n3_metrics %>% mutate(.config="df_n3",
                                                feature="df")
cv_df_n2_metrics <- cv_df_n2_metrics %>% mutate(.config="df_n2",
                                                feature="df")
cv_df_n1_metrics <- cv_df_n1_metrics %>% mutate(.config="df_n1",
                                                feature="df")

cv_metrics_df <- rbind(cv_df_n1_metrics,
                       cv_df_n2_metrics,
                       cv_df_n3_metrics,
                       cv_df_n4_metrics,
                       cv_df_n5_metrics,
                       cv_df_n6_metrics)

saveRDS(cv_metrics_df, 
        here("data/processed_data/rand_forest/cv_metrics_df.rds"))
```
